column5: Hello everyone,  Does anyone one have any experience mounting the rail system( I think that's what its called) on your boat when the gunwales are too narrow. I want this system so I can hook up my down riggers and trolling rods...... I looked at the rails and they look to be about 3 to 5 inches. The side of my boat is maybe 2 to 3 inches. I have a 16 foot smoker craft stinger. Any suggestions or pictures?  Todd
Todd, this may be an option for you..  http://www.pursuitsports.com/store/t_bolt_mounting.htm
